definitions: in a self-assured way that expresses faith in oneself or one's abilities or qualities

examples.text: I strode confidently up to the rope

shortDefinitions: in self-assured way that expresses faith in oneself or one's abilities or qualities

definitions: in a way that expresses little or no doubt about something

examples.text: he confidently predicts a change of fortune

shortDefinitions: in way that expresses little or no doubt about something
